name: Андрей Жевлаков
description:
# Обо мне:
Привет, меня зовут Андрей Жевлаков!
# Мои проекты:

projects.label: LINES
projects.description: __A geometric puzzle__ made in a __minimalist style__, in which you have to use **logic** and **skill** to solve problems without knowing the goal. Over time, the game becomes more complicated, introducing new possibilities and combinations. I am sure that with each complete level you will be more and more proud of myself, because **it's really hard!**
